Package org.araneaframework.integration.spring

Classes that integrate Spring with Aranea, including Aranea dispatcher servlet.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SpringLocalizationContext Extends the LocalizationContext to provide the localization using the MessageSource from the Spring framework.
 

Class Summary
AraneaSpringDispatcherServlet Aranea dispatcher servlet that assembles Aranea components according to the configuration specified in Spring bean configuration files.
SpringInjectionUtil Utility to enable dependency injection.
SpringLocalizationFilterService Provides the SpringLocalizationContext and LocalizationContext implementation that uses the MessageSource of the Spring framework.
SpringOptionalFilterService This is a utility service to enable custom filter service chains in XML configuration.
SpringOptionalFilterWidget This is a utility widget to enable custom filter widget chains in XML configuration.
SpringServiceFactory A simple factory to be used in the xml configuration files for creating services with factories.
 

Package org.araneaframework.integration.spring Description

Classes that integrate Spring with Aranea, including Aranea dispatcher servlet.
